EmailTemplate.name: 2019.12.02 - Whitespace - PricePlan Email.WhiteSpace-PricePlan-Main-Email
EmailTemplate.subject: You Can Get Better Pricing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I’m Sean from Grand & Toy and I am here to support your account. Recently, I have reviewed your account and I noticed that you are part of an outdated pricing plan that doesn’t offer you the best pricing on paper, toner and technology. I’ve been working hard with other companies who were in a similar situation and have helped them by providing them with a choice of two new pricing plans that offer better value for you. These free plans will provide you with better offers on national brand products or Grand & Toy private label products, and improved pricing on paper, toner and technology. All you have to do is choose one based on what’s more important to you So, if you’re interested you can compare the 2 plans here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Nurture---WhiteSpace-PricingPlan_WhiteSpace-PricingPlan-Master.html]]>.
You’d be working with me if you were to make the switch as I am your dedicated point of contact. You can go back to your original plan at any time.
If you have any questions or don’t feel as though these 2 plans satisfy your needs, feel free to contact me. Sincerely, Sean Beauchemin Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z7 E-mail: seanbeauchemin@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:seanbeauchemin@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 1-800-348-2184 Ext: 44170 Fax: 1-613-244-0765 Toll Free/Sans Frais Fax: 1-866-391-8555 Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom | Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
